findings.title: Debug Enabled For Application
findings.description: Debugging was enabled on the app which makes it easier for reverse engineers to hook a debugger to it. This allows dumping a stack trace and accessing debugging helper classes.

findings.title: TaskAffinity is set for Activity (edu. ksu. cs. benign. ImageEditor)
findings.description: If taskAffinity is set, then other application could read the Intents sent to Activities belonging to another task.
findings.recommendation: Always use the default setting keeping the affinity as the package name in order to prevent sensitive information inside sent or received Intents  from being read by another application.
